name: market-data
description: Source market data from 3rd party providers with a typescript function
author: Robert Cicero

scripts.compile: export NODE_ENV=prod && npm run clean && tsc && npm run post-build
scripts.post-build: cpx package.json built/ && cpx ormconfig.js built/ && cp -R node_modules/ built/node_modules/
scripts.dev-long-open: export NODE_ENV=dev && npm run compile && node -e 'require("./built/app").lambdaHandler([{"actionType": "Open","direction": "LONG","pair": "AUD/USD", "orderDateUTC":"", "priceTarget": 0.7654}])'
scripts.dev-long-close: export NODE_ENV=dev && npm run compile && node -e 'require("./built/app").lambdaHandler([{"actionType": "Close","direction": "LONG","pair": "AUD/USD", "orderDateUTC":"", "priceTarget": 0.761}])'
scripts.dev-long-open-close: export NODE_ENV=dev && npm run compile && node -e 'require("./built/app").lambdaHandler([{"actionType": "Open","direction": "LONG","pair": "AUD/USD", "orderDateUTC":"", "priceTarget": 0.761},{"id": 1,"orderDate": "2021-11-12 05:20:00","orderDateUTC": "2021-11-11 18:20:00","pair": "AUD/USD","priceTarget": 0.72932,"direction": "SHORT","actionType": "Close"}])'
scripts.dev-short-open: export NODE_ENV=dev && npm run compile && node -e 'require("./built/app").lambdaHandler([{"actionType": "Open","direction": "SHORT","pair": "AUD/USD", "orderDateUTC":"", "priceTarget": 0.7654}])'
scripts.dev-short-close: export NODE_ENV=dev && npm run compile && node -e 'require("./built/app").lambdaHandler([{"actionType": "Close","direction": "SHORT","pair": "AUD/USD", "orderDateUTC":"", "priceTarget": 0.761}])'
